=API for agent-utils=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.agent-utils))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_capture-and-send_vars_agent_action_&_args) capture-and-send] 

----
===(`_`capture-and-send`_` vars agent action & args)===
====Macro====
<pre> Capture the current value of the specified vars and rebind 
them on the agent thread before executing the action.

 Example:
  (capture-and-send `[``*`out`*``]` a f b c)</pre>
